g.text: Get previous checkpoint of last record processed (Lower limit for inclusion)
[@intervalMin IS NULL => segment record NOT FOUND]
Clean up transferTimeout from finalised transfers
Clean up transferTimeout from finalised transfers
Prepare data and return the list for expiration
Prepare data and get transfers to be expired
Insert all new transfers still in processing state
SELECT tt.transferId, 'EXPIRED_PREPARED' AS transferStateId, 'Aborted by Timeout Handler' AS reason
-- Following subquery is reused 3 times and may be optimized if needed
SELECT tt.transferId, 'RESERVED_TIMEOUT' AS transferStateId, 'Expired by Timeout Handler' AS reason
Update segment table to be used for the next run
